name: Chandrashilla Top Trek
description:
This trekking tour is one of the best tours to explore the magnificence of the great Garhwali Himalayan ranges. Chandrashilla Top is the main attraction of this trekking your. Atop Chandrashilla, the trekkers can witness the enchanting and glorious beauty of several snow-capped mountain peaks. While on this trek, the trekkers can also explore the Deoriatal Lake and the confluence of tow of the holy rivers in India. Camping at various locations will enchant the trekkers for sure.

In order to provide the best trekking expedition, this trip has been hand-selected by the local trekking experts. This trekking itinerary consists of all sorts of trains and trails.
